required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pre-Approval Access to JNJ-53718678 for the Treatment of Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) Infection in (a) Immunocompromised Adult and Pediatric Participants
clinical_study.official_title: JNJ-53718678 RSV Pre-Approval Access_Single Patient Access (SPR) for Patients Diagnosed With RSV

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this pre-approval access program is to provide treatment to immunocompromised participants with serious/life-threatening diseases or conditions (Respiratory Syncytial Virus [RSV] infection) and to collect the safety data to understand the safety profile of JNJ-53718678.

intervention.description: JNJ-53718678 will be administered as directed by treating physician.

overall_official.last_name: Janssen Research & Development, LLC Clinical Trial
